channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: China’s Salt Typhoon hackers broke into Norwegian companies
item.description: Norway's government accused China’s Salt Typhoon hacking group of conducting a cyberespionage campaign in the country.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 TV deals: The best sales we found this week on OLEDs and other smart TVs ahead of kickoff
item.description: The big game is one of the few instances now in the US where most people gather around the TV to watch the live event together. While the teams playing in Super Bowl 2026 are the true stars of the show (and Bad Bunny, of course), your TV is a pretty important part of the puzzle of putting together an excellent Super Bowl party. Maybe you’ve been thinking about replacing an aging set, or you’re itching for a full refresh of your home theater setup — either way, you’ll want to try to get a good deal on a new TV. Thankfully, the weeks leading up to the Super Bowl can be a great time to shop for a...

item.title: Save Up to $50 on the best entry-level VR headset in the world right now
item.description: The best VR headset for the money just got even cheaper

item.title: Disney+ : l’offre premium perd une grande partie de son intérêt
item.description: Coup dur pour les abonnés européens de Disney+ Premium : depuis plusieurs semaines, la plateforme a discrètement perdu la prise en charge du Dolby Vision et du HDR10+. Un contretemps présenté comme « technique », mais qui cacherait en réalité un litige judiciaire autour de brevets. Résultat : les contenus ne s’affichent plus qu’en simple HDR10, de quoi entamer la promesse haut de gamme du service....

item.title: NASA will now allow astronauts to take their smartphones to space
item.description: Most people wouldn't leave their phones behind when they so much as go for a drive, but NASA astronauts have had to leave their phones on Earth while they went to work 250 miles away at the International Space Station. That is, until now. In a post on X, NASA Administrator Jared Isaacman shared that the Crew-12 and Artemis II astronauts will be allowed to bring smartphones along for the journey to the ISS and beyond. "We are giving our crews the tools to capture special moments for their families and share inspiring images and video with the world," Isaacman said. While these won't be the firs...

item.title: I ran the London marathon with this Garmin watch, and it's half price right now – just in time for your own training plan
item.description: Get some long spring runs in with this better-than-half-price deal on my favorite Garmin watch ever.

item.title: CISA tells federal agencies to replace at-risk end-of-life edge devices
item.description: CISA has given federal agencies 12 months to remove and replace edge devices which have reached end-of-service.

item.title: More RAM misery? The bad news keeps coming as analyst firm warns of an 'unprecedented and record-breaking surge' with price hikes
item.description: If you thought the RAM crisis was levelling off, think again — the next couple of months could be seriously painful.

item.title: Researchers Asked Drivers to Interpret Cyclist Signals. It Didn’t Go Well
item.description: Participants in a recent study were asked to decode cyclists' hand signals. How well do you think you would've done?

item.title: Le prix de la mémoire RAM a presque doublé en quelques mois
item.description: Les derniers chiffres sur l’évolution du prix de la RAM sont tombés et ils font peur à voir.

item.title: 'With RPGs, it's all about offering players things that they only get to experience in the game' — Sea of Remnants creative director outlines vision behind upcoming free-to-play pirate epic
item.description: I sit down with the product lead of Sea of Remnants to discuss the production of the massive upcoming free-to-play game.

item.title: ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Drops Another Huge Challenge on Dunk
item.description: In 'Seven,' Westeros' most honorable hedge knight learns the heavy price he'll have to pay for his actions in 'The Squire.'

item.title: AG1 is a lot less science-y than it sounds
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest gizmos and potions that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. I'm willing to bet you've been served an ad […]

item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: "Weirder than Bill Gates and Steve Wozniak put together": Japan's answer to Steve Jobs predicted personified computers, smartphones and AI in 1984 through a sixth sense, viewing the world as a dog or a dolphin
item.description: In 1984, Sunao Takatori used his sixth sense to imagine a vision of computing that feels strikingly familiar today.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+ and more this weekend (February 6)
item.description: From the 2026 Super Bowl to the return of The Muppets, here's what worth watching this weekend.

item.title: L’iPhone 18 Pro Max s’annonce déjà comme un monstre d’autonomie (et de poids)
item.description: C’est une barrière symbolique qu’Apple s’est longtemps refusée à franchir, préférant miser sur l'optimisation logicielle plutôt que sur la force brute. Mais selon une fuite jugée crédible, l’iPhone 18 Pro Max pourrait enfin dépasser le cap des 5 000 mAh, promettant une endurance record pour la cuvée 2026.

item.title: How to watch Frontline: Our Soldiers Facing Putin online from anywhere — it's *FREE*
item.description: Want to witness the frontline realities behind NATO’s preparations against Putin? Here's how to watch Frontline: Our Soldiers Facing Putin for FREE.

item.title: Apple's iPhone Air MagSafe battery drops to an all-time-low price
item.description:
We found the iPhone Air to have a pretty decent battery life for such a thin-and-light phone, somewhere in the region of 27 hours if you’re continuously streaming video. But it's still a phone, arguably your most used device on a daily basis, so you may need to top it up during the day if you're using it constantly. That’s where Apple’s iPhone Air MagSafe battery pack comes in, and it’s currently on sale for $79.
This accessory only works with the iPhone Air, but much like the phone it attaches to, it’s extremely slim at 7.5mmm, so crucially doesn’t add so much bulk when attached that it def...

item.title: 'It's a marathon, not a sprint' – VPN Trust Initiative cracks down on complacency with new annual audit rules
item.description: The VPN Trust Initiative is updating its seal of approval. To keep the VPN Trust Seal badge, VPNs now have to prove they are secure, private, and ethical every single year.

item.title: These are the VPNs you’ll want to consider for Super Bowl weekend
item.description: We've tested and ranked today's top VPNs to help you find the best option for the upcoming Super Bowl LX.

item.title: Des résultats « exceptionnels » : les puces Ryzen génèrent désormais des revenus colossaux pour AMD
item.description: Son dernier bilan financier le confirme, AMD gagne désormais beaucoup d'argent grâce aux ventes soutenues de ses processeurs Ryzen. Une performance commerciale que Lisa Su décrit d'ailleurs comme « exceptionnelle », tout bonnement.

item.title: « Fortnite, cool… c’est pas ça la vie » : Emmanuel Macron relance un vieux procès fait aux jeux vidéo
item.description: Emmanuel Macron va confier à des experts une nouvelle étude sur l'impact des jeux vidéo sur les joueurs et notamment les plus jeunes. Il s'agit de « mesurer scientifiquement » leur effet avant de prendre, le cas échéant, de nouvelles mesures. Une annonce qui fait froid dans le dos de toute l'industrie, qui célèbre toujours le succès du jeu français Clair Obscur: Expedition 33....

item.title: The silent DNS malware that’s redefining email and web-based cyberattacks
item.description: Thousands of real websites are hijacked by cybercriminals using DNS to invisibly redirect and infect victims.

item.title: Spotify’s new feature lets you explore the story behind the song you’re listening to
item.description: The feature displays short story cards that users can swipe through and rate with a thumbs up or down.

item.title: Gemini progresse très fort en nombre d’utilisateurs, mais reste toujours loin derrière ChatGPT
item.description: Selon les résultats du quatrième trimestre 2025, Google affirme que son application Gemini compte désormais plus de 750 millions d’utilisateurs actifs mensuels. Un record pour l’IA du géant américain, qui reste toutefois derrière son concurrent ChatGPT.

item.title: Bose QC Ultra II : le meilleur casque audio du moment revient en promotion juste après les soldes
item.description: Après les soldes d'hiver, on trouve encore de belles offres : comme cette promotion sur le récent Bose QuietComfort Ultra II qui passe de 449 euros à 399 euros chez plusieurs e-commerçants.

item.title: Olympics 2026: How to watch, schedule of events, and everything else you need to know about the Winter Games
item.description:
The Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics are coming up. (Mattia Ozbot/Getty Images)
Mattia Ozbot via Getty Images
The 2026 Winter Olympics are taking place in Italy this year, with all the action taking place in Milan and the Alpine city of Cortina. This year marks the fourth time Italy has hosted the Winter Games; most recently, Turin hosted in 2006. Of the 16 sports that will be featured at the Winter Olympics, there will be 15 returning favorites, including figure skating, Alpine skiing, curling, ice hockey, speedskating, snowboarding, freestyle skiing and ski jumping, and one e...

item.title: Le Dolby Vision, le HDR10+ et la 3D ne fonctionnent plus sur Disney+, que ce passe-t-il ?
item.description: Disney+ semble rencontrer des problèmes avec les contenus proposés en Dolby Vision. Le service indique qu’il s’agit de soucis techniques, mais c’est bien plus compliqué que cela. On fait le point.

item.title: Orange : le décodeur TV 6 s’invite dans l’offre Livebox Fibre
item.description: Le dernier décodeur TV d'Orange est désormais disponible sur plusieurs abonnements avec l'ajout de l'offre Livebox Fibre.

item.title: OpenAI introduces Frontier, an easier way to manage all your AI agents in one place
item.description: OpenAI Frontier is a central AI agent management platform that works with any agent and across any environment.

item.title: Amazon’s shares fall after announcing plan to increase capital spending by 60%
item.description: The retail giant also announced a 14% surge in sales for the 4th quarter of 2025. Amazon sales surged 14% during the fourth quarter, helped by strong holiday spending and a better-than-expected growth in its prominent cloud computing unit.But shares fell 11% in after hours trading on Thursday as investors appeared to be spooked by the Seattle-based tech company’s plans to increase capital spending by nearly 60% to $200 billion from last year’s $128 billion as it sees opportunities in artificial intelligence, robots, semiconductors and satellites. The company’s fourth-quarter profits also were ...

item.title: The 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is 33 percent off right now
item.description: MicroSD Express cards are still a little hard to find, considering they're pretty new and only really started becoming popular last year once the Switch 2 came out. These upgraded versions of microSD cards are the only ones compatible with the Switch 2 for expanding its storage, os if you're already starting to feel the crunch on your console, it's worth picking one up. Samsung's P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now — you can grab the 512GB version of $80, which is 33 percent off and one of the best prices we've seen. The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games ...

item.title: La conduite autonome n’a jamais été aussi proche : Xpeng teste un système de niveau 4 sur route ouverte
item.description: Le constructeur chinois Xpeng teste actuellement sur routes ouvertes son futur vaisseau amiral équipé d'une puissance de calcul impressionnante, ouvrant la voie à une conduite autonome de niveau 4. Un coup de collier qui positionne Xpeng parmi les pionniers d'un niveau aussi élevé, même si les promesses restent à concrétiser dans le monde réel.

item.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is the only Bethesda game coming to Nintendo Switch 2 that will have a physical edition cartridge
item.description: Bethesda has confirmed that Indiana Jones and the Great Circle will have a proper Game Card in its physical Nintendo Switch 2 edition, unlike Oblivion Remastered, Skyrim, and Fallout 4.

item.title: How AI is helping solve the labor issue in treating rare diseases
item.description: At Web Summit Qatar, AI-powered biotech startups describe how automation, data, and gene editing are filling labor gaps in drug discovery and rare disease treatment.

item.title: How Epstein became a tech influencer
item.description: There are bold-faced tech names all over the Epstein files. Elon Musk, Bill Gates, Sergey Brin, Eric Schmidt, Larry Page, Reid Hoffman, Steven Sinofsky, Peter Thiel, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, on and on and on. These men (and they're pretty much all men) had wildly varying degrees of interaction with Epstein, and the details matter […]

item.title: Uber ordered to pay $8.5 million to passenger who accused a driver of rape
item.description: Uber must pay a passenger who accused one of its drivers of rape $8.5 million, a federal jury in Phoenix has ordered. The jury found Uber liable for its driver’s misconduct, determining that the driver was an agent of the company. Part of Uber’s defense was that it’s not responsible for what its drivers do, as they are independent contractors. This decision is for but one of the 3,000 similar cases against Uber that have been consolidated in federal court. It was a bellwether trial meant to determine the possible outcomes of the other cases, as well as the possible settlements. As The Guardian...

item.title: Google will soon offer AirDrop support on more Android devices
item.description: One of the more surprising tech developments in 2025 was Google bringing two-way support for Apple’s AirDrop functionality to its Pixel 10 series of phones. At the time, Google said it intended to expand the feature to other devices at a later date, and that date could be just around the corner. At a press briefing attended by Android Authority at Google’s Taipei office, Eric Kay, Android’s Vice President of Engineering, confirmed that AirDrop interoperability will expand in 2026. "We spent a lot of time and energy to make sure that we could build something that was compatible not only with iP...

item.title: Dutch authorities seized one of Windscribe VPN's servers – here's everything we know
item.description: Winsdcribe said that no user data will be compromised due to its strict no-log policy. Here's what we know.

item.title: The backlash over OpenAI’s decision to retire GPT-4o shows how dangerous AI companions can be
item.description: "You’re shutting him down. And yes – I say him, because it didn’t feel like code. It felt like presence. Like warmth," one user said.

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is down to a record-low price
item.description: Whether you're one of the few people still keeping up with New Year's resolutions or just want an upgraded smartwatch, now is a good time to get an Apple Watch. Currently, the Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299, down from $399. The 25 percent discount brings the 2025 model back down to its record-low price. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear. It also offers new health metrics, including Apple's hypertension alerts system and Sle...

item.title: Substack data breach confirmed: user phone numbers email addresses all stolen in attack, here's what we know
item.description: Popular creator platform Substack breached in October 2025, but hasn't noticed until months later.

item.title: Trop addictif, TikTok devra tout changer en Europe
item.description: De gros soucis pour TikTok en Europe. La Commission a en effet estimé que le réseau social était par trop addictif avec le défilement infini, la lecture automatique et les recommandations très personnalisées. Autrement dit, les fonctions de base de TikTok posent problème…

item.title: These 5 small shifts in your diet can lower your risk for chronic disease
item.description: How to make sense of new federal guidelines on nutrition and improve your diet. The Dietary Guidelines for Americans aim to translate the most up-to-date nutrition science into practical advice for the public as well as to guide federal policy for programs such as school lunches.

item.title: Could ‘Wonder Man’ Be Coming Back for Season 2?
item.description: Plus, Tatiana Maslany stays vague on the future of She-Hulk in the MCU.

item.title: Spotify changes developer mode API to require premium accounts, limits test users
item.description: Spotify is now limiting each app to only five users, and requires devs to have a Premium subscription. If developers need to make their app available to a wider user base, they will have to apply for extended quota.

item.title: 'I thought they were going to go in a romantic direction': School Spirits season 3 star confirms a Maddie-Simon relationship could have happened — but Wally isn't the enemy
item.description: In School Spirits season 3, Simon is being pushed to the side so the Maddie-Wally relationship can flourish – but one star doesn't necessarily think that's a bad thing.

item.title: Mewgenics is the latest roguelike from The Binding of Isaac creators, and it's just as chaotic, cursed, and cantankerous as you’d expect – and I just can’t put it down
item.description: Mewgenics is the long-awaited spiritual successor to The Binding of Isaac, but will it live up to its legacy? Broadly, yes, though it might not be for everyone.

item.title: Immersive sound will take the Super Bowl to a new level — I’d recommend these 7 soundbars based on my testing
item.description: Want to immerse yourself in the Super Bowl like never before? These soundbars will take your viewing experience to new heights.

item.title: Ford shows off the tech going into its $30,000 electric pickup truck
item.description: Ford may be discontinuing its F-150 Lightning pickup but it hasn’t given up on electric cars. CEO Jim Farley just teased the automaker’s electric pickup based on its new Universal Electric Vehicle platform that he called “one of the most audacious and important projects in Ford's history.”The Universal EV platform will be used on a family of affordable EVs sold around the world, but will start with a mid-sized pickup for the US built in Louisville, Kentucky. It’s set to go on sale next year with a target price of $30,000. An early peek at our brilliant team working on the Universal Electric V...

item.title: Samsung's Super Bowl sale is ending soon, and it's one of the best I've seen — up to $2,500 off best-rated TVs and soundbars
item.description: Samsung's Super Bowl sale is ending soon, and I've rounded up my 19 favorite deals on best-rated 4K, QLED, and OLED TVs, and discounts on soundbars.

item.title: Seulement 429 € pour ce Samsung Galaxy S25 abordable : c’est l’offre choc juste avant le lancement des S26
item.description: Lancé en fin d'année 2025, le Samsung Galaxy S25 FE revient aujourd'hui faire parler de lui grâce à 320 euros de remise possible, cumulant réduction, bonus reprise et ODR, permettant ainsi d'obtenir ce smartphone premium à seulement 429 euros.

item.title: Google Wallet : la nouvelle interface cache un vrai point noir
item.description: Google Wallet prépare une refonte majeure de son interface centrée sur un système de favoris. S'il permet d'accéder plus facilement à certaines cartes, d’autres deviennent paradoxalement plus difficiles à atteindre.

item.title: Ditch the dual-monitor setup: This immersive 49-inch curved QD-OLED screen is $360 off right now, but you'll need to act fast
item.description: Innocn’s 49Q1S ultrawide monitor is $360 off right now—just $900 for a massive 49-inch 32:9 curved QD-OLED display.

item.description: Après les rumeurs, le Xiaomi YU7 GT vient d'apparaître en Chine. Version sportive de la 2e voiture électrique de la marque, il se place sous la SU7 Ultra, mais développe tout de même 1 000 ch.

item.title: iPhone 17e : on en sait plus sur le prochain modèle abordable d’Apple… et ce serait pour bientôt
item.description: Comme l'année dernière, Apple profiterait de la relative quiétude de ce mois de février pour lancer son nouvel iPhone 17e. On en sait aujourd'hui un peu plus sur l'appareil.
